content.question: The tensions between lords and peasants implied by the demands were in part a result of which of the following demographic trends?

choices.label: The recovery of population after the mortality associated with the Black Death
The increasing migration of people from rural areas to towns and cities
The increase in population resulting from the decline of warfare in the German states
The migration of large numbers of Europeans to overseas territories

content.answer: The recovery of population after the mortality associated with the Black Death

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
